description: We need to improve the Ironic driver logs, currently we have very little. E.g there's only one INFO log in the whole driver code.
title: Ironic: Improve logs

comments.content: We need to improve the Ironic driver logs, currently we have very little. E.g there's only one INFO log in the whole driver code.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lucasagomes

comments.content: The logging has been improved over time, so we'll close this for now.  If you still think there's a lack of logging here, please re-open the bug.  Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mrda
